sent.orig: The quality and the ability include management ability, operation ability, relation ability body-mind and thought quality.
sent.trans: 素质与能力包括管理能力、业务能力、人际关系能力、身心及思想素质四个纬度。

sent.orig: The visual learning ability is composedvisual memory ability visual observation ability and visual judgment ability.
sent.trans: 在视觉学习能力中又分为记忆力、观察力和判断力的培养。

sent.orig: It also inquires into the problems in students' engineering design ability, innovation ability, and ability, etc.
sent.trans: 对如何培养学生的工程设计能力、动手能力以及创新能力等问题进行了探讨。

sent.orig: Ability: Ability to communicate clearly and concisely, ability to understand customer and market requirements thoroughly.
sent.trans: 能力：能够清晰准确的交流，能深入理解用户和市场要求。

sent.orig: Train envision ability of the, and innovation ability, transpire their thoughts. To cultivate students' practice ability.
sent.trans: 2培养学生的想象能力，创新能力，发散性思维；提高他们的动手能力。
